title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat model inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs, streaming, and POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem that wraps the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects and blocks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Next.js app, Discord bot, function-calling examples, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker image (CPU & GPU) plus compose stacks with WebUI, Open-WebUI, or LibreChat.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama with chat history, model manager and dark theme.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into Discord threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into Slack channels with thread support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing a TypeScript-first client for Ollama REST APIs.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight Python client for chatting, generating and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for discussing new models, tools, benchmarks and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
